transArray.content: Check-in at the hotel was very fast. As soon as I entered the lobby, I saw a lot of oranges. This was better than the previous Orange Hotel. The breakfast was very rich, with both Chinese and Western food. The room was fully equipped and very warm. I was very satisfied!

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated refrigerators, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories and sincere expectations. Your next visit! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
